2,Verify Successful Purchase Process from Home to Cart,Navigate to the home page and access the accessories category to view a specific product. Add the item to the cart and proceed to the checkout page. Verify the contents of the cart.,"Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Accessories' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on link  -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 4: Click on button 'Buy'
Step 5: Click on link 'Place an order' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
3,View Specific Information by Accessing Link,Navigate to the home page and access a specific link within the page content to view detailed information.,Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on list
Step 3: Click on link '+1 (000) 123-45-67'

,High
1,Verify Successful Order Completion for Apple Products,Navigate to the home page and select the Apple category to view available products. Add a product to the cart and proceed to the payment checkout. Complete the order process and verify the successful completion.,Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on button
Step 4: Click on label
Step 5: Click on label
Step 6: Click on button 'Buy'
Step 7: Proceed through checkout process
